title: The Ghost's Diary üëª ‚úì

Description:
"I am being torn apart for more reasons than one."
    
    ‚à´
    
    Elara Jane knows nothing of borders and cares little for rules or customs but yet, she dedicates her life to the new Jedi code. Enslaved by the Hutt's, a vicious gangster group on Tatooine, Elara is rescued by Luke Skywalker when he comes across her force sensitivity when she is very young. Elara is enrolled at a Jedi Academy to become part of the next era of Jedi Knights, along with her other fellow companions. Time for her was something she'd never fight, mainly because she knew that every moment would be with Ben Solo...before he was seduced by the Dark Side.
    
    Join Elara Jane and Ben Solo before and after he becomes the feared Kylo Ren.
    
    ‚à´
    
    "Darkness At Dawn is literally my favourite Kylo Ren fanfiction on this app! It's very well written and there's always something new to it! I love the amount of detail put into every chapter. Darkness At Dawn is amazing!" 
    -Solo_Kenobi
    
    "Darkness At Dawn is among the top Star Wars fanfictions I have read, where an original character (Elara Jane) is woven seamlessly into the story, even in the overlaps of 'The Force Awakens'. The characters spring from the screen, just as alive as George Lucas' characters. It is a beautiful story of love, coming-of-age, heartbreak and redemption." 
    -Chicwriterchick
    
    "Darkness At Dawn is an incredible story of love, despair and struggle between characters everyone loves. It's written to be as if you are with Elara Jane, fighting between the dark and the light. Everything is thought through and has a deeper meaning behind it. Each chapter keeps you captivated with the story and eagerly awaiting every new turn."
    -Captainasgard04
    
    *Events leading up to and after The Force Awakens*
    *All rights belong to the brilliant mind of George Lucas. I own nothing but a few selected characters*
    *First book in the 'Awakening' series*
    *Completed March 20th 2016*
B·∫£o L∆∞u M·ªçi Quy·ªÅn

*BRITTANY BROSKI APPROVED*
    
    RANKINGS:
    #1 - starwars 6/10/2019
    #3 - kylo 6/10/2019
    #3 - kyloren 6/10/2019
    
    He made eye contact with me with those intense brown eyes, and his vision traveled down my body, looking at every curve and flaw. He got down to my feet and looked all the way back up, taking in every part of me. I was scared now. I had no control over my body because of The Force and the way he looked at me, greedily, hungrily, left me terror-stricken. 
    
    Kylo Ren climbed up swiftly onto the bed so he was laying next to me. He supported himself with his right elbow and placed his left hand on my lower stomach. His gloved hand was massive. His thumb and pinkie extended from each of my hip bones. I shut my eyes tightly. My breath significantly quickened. 
    
    I felt his hand graze up my stomach, and I could hear him breathing heavily. His hand continued it's slow path up my chest and to my exposed neck. I swallowed down an impulsive scream that I couldn't help from rising as I felt him lean in towards me. His black locks fell onto my face and they smelled of mint. 
    
    His hand was gently resting on my neck and his hot breath was on my ear. My heart was pounding and I was sure he could feel it. 
    
    "It was so hard for me not to ravish you in front of everyone in Tunstead." His lips grazed my cheekbone. "The sensation was almost overpowering. You're lucky I have . . . Self-control."
    
    _____
    
    This book is for readers who can handle maturity, violence, and who have a true appreciation for not only Kylo Ren/Adam Driver's beauty but for the Star Wars universe!
    
    Highest rank: #33 in Fanfiction! #2 in Star Wars!
    
    Copyright 2016 @ flywithmyjetpack . Please do not copy or steal my story/ideas.
    
    I don't own any part of the Star Wars episodes. I don't own any part of the characters or plot of Star Wars. 
    
    However, THIS plot and most characters in this book are mine so please don't copy or mock my stories!

title: PRETTY VENOM, CORPSE HUSBAND ‚úì

Description:
//~Part 1 of the Shattered Secret Dyad~\\
    
    ((TW: Pregnancy..... started this at the age of 14 back in 2015 so please bear with me))
    
    ----------
    "It's the secrets that we keep that seem to destroy the world around us," I say, hoping my fear was well hidden.
    
    "Says the girl who kept a secret from me for six years," Ren snarls back.
    ---------
    You were small when you first met Ben Solo, the boy with the Dark hair, your best friend.
    You've known him all your life, sharing countless memories together. 
    
    But one day, he says he has to leave to train to be a Jedi with his Uncle Luke. He promises to return, and the night before he leaves is one you would never forget. But you leave the planet of Corellia you've called home only after two months goes by, and that's when the secrets start.
    
    A year passes, and word is spread that Ben has fallen to the Dark Side, killing all of the Jedi Padawans Luke had trained. Devastated, you return to the only home you've ever known for the comforting of General Leia. 
    
    Five years pass when you finally come face to face with Kylo Ren, your secrets trailing behind you like the cape on his back.

Description:
Sequel to "The youngest Grimborn"
    In which Thyra continues her adventure in a world of dragons and Vikings.
    
    
    -~-~-~-
    
    It has been a while since I left Dragon's Edge. I feel a little guilty, I mean, I left a note, I held contact... sort of...
    
    But still, I know Hiccup is looking for me, but I can't go back there. Not after everything that happened. I miss my brother, wow, who would have thought I'd ever say that?
    
    It hurts more than I want to admit, I hurts more than I can admit. So perhaps that is why I find myself in this situation now. Following some cruel hunter and a mysterious man, because he sounded like my brother. At least, that's what I wanted to hear. 
    
    But it can't be, Viggo is dead, right? No one survives the fall in a volcano...
    
    - Thyra Grimborn

Description:
(COMPLETED)
      
      *
      
      "Look, Mavis, you're a beautiful girl with lots of potential and I'm so sorry about this but I reject you, Mavis Anders, as my mate."
      
      My body erupted in pain. The bones were being smashed by an invisible force. I'd heard of pain like this but they'd never say the extent of it. Knives were thrown into my neck leaving a burning sensation my mouth dry and my legs numb as I laid there in shook.
      
      "You've got to accept it now." Ace explained unfazed by my pain. "It's the only way to make the pain go away."
      
      "But I don't want to accept rejection. I won't accept your rejection."

title: Twin Drama

Description:
When the Marauders were in school they made a friend who one day disappeared, only to be pronounced dead soon after. Years later, they get a letter telling them that their friend is still alive. How will they react? Will she still accept them?
    
    Anastasia Ivanova. Ana Ivans. Quake. She goes by many names. She was a special project that both the Red Room and Hydra worked on. She was sent to Hogwarts to gain control of her power, but called to return to the Red Room before she could complete her education. What will happen when she goes back? What will her new family think once they know the truth about her? How will her old friends react?

title: Quake

Description:
**EXCERPT FROM THE STORY**
    "As the new Alpha of vengeful eyed pack,I thereby pass my first judgment on Ciara Acacia Jones,You are therefore demoted to an omega." He said with so much hatred, anger and rage using his alpha tone.
    I felt my wolf,Tavia,whimpered and cowered back in fear under his voice.
    ______________________________
    "Kill her... Kill her..."
    "Wait,can I see you privately?" I said to Alpha Xander.
    ____________________________
    "No,you cannot mark her,I am your mate, What will happen to me if you mark her." I said while crying.
    "You cannot do this to me, please!!!."I said begging him.
    "I have to do it for my pack... our pack."He said before leaving.
    Being born an omega is different from being made an omega.
    Meet Ciara Acacia Jones,a beta's daughter who was reduced to an omega rank and blamed for a tragic incident that claimed lots of lives.
    Will she survive the pain?
    Will the truth be revealed?
    When she meets her mate,will he accept or reject her?
    Will she ever find happiness?-Does she deserve it?
    Find out in this thrilling story...

title: Demoted To An Omega

Description:
Cecelia Lake thought she had a normal human life, she had a hot boyfriend with stupid jock friends. Two incredible best friends with striking personalities, and a big dark secret that she wasn't aware her memory held captive from her.

    But Cece was never normal, in fact she was the furthest thing from it.

      On her seventeenth birthday, she was carried into the woods by no other than her new neighbour, who couldn't seem to act anything but mean when he was around her. But only when she unlocks the key to her past does she learn the truth. 

      Cece involves herself in a world where magical creatures of all kinds live, but what she doesn't 
know, is that they need a leader, and maybe Cece is just a little bit more special than she ever thought she could be....



*Book One In The DarkFall Series*

Description:
When Adrienne's app TMI is a resounding success, she can't wait to reveal the dirty secrets of the glamorous "it" crowd of her prestigious school, but soon, lines begin to blur and she might find herself being the one who falls.
    
    ***
    
    Adrienne's plans have come to fruition. Her app, TMI, has taken Petraka Academy by storm, with its promise to reveal and confirm the juiciest gossip. It is also endorsed by the shiny "it" crowd who can't wait to ridicule the fallen. But they have no clue that Adrienne is coming for them, ready to push them off their pedestals one by one. Because she knows something no one else would believe. She knows that top-of-the-food chain Rosie Geld killed Audrey Hart. And once the truth hits TMI, everyone will know, and the guilty will finally pay.
    
    [[Watty Award winner in Mystery/Thriller]]
    
    Content warning: This story contains themes of bullying, sexual assault, eating disorders, drug use, abuse, violence and suicide.
    
    ***
    
    TMI is now also available on YONDER, your next-generation reading app from the Wattpad family.
    
    Join me on YONDER today! Find it now in your app store.
    
    Cover designed by Holly Thurston

title: T.M.I.

Description:
"Bridget Jones with a lot more wine! This story is hilarious, feel-good and relatable in all the best ways!" - Grace K @ HQ.
    
    She's just quit her high-flying job and her marriage is coasting on fumes. Can Alice find a sense of purpose in all the madness?
    
                                                                          ***** 
    Alice's life isn't going to plan. She's tied to her phone, pointlessly managing PR for a sinking corporate megalith. She's become a bit player in her kids' lives and her marriage is coasting on fumes. Forcing herself into action with a rash resignation, Alice sets out to make a positive impact on the world around her. But how? Meditation leads to napping and her attempts to get closer to her teenage daughter result in the discovery of a secret that left her at loss of what to do! As the months tick by and a sense of purpose continues to elude her, Alice finds herself forming bonds with the most unlikely characters: the young woman who panhandles outside her old office; the homeless boy who sits cross-legged outside the liquor store with his ginger cat; her own dog walker who, it turns out, knows a thing or two about developing a good crema. Testing the limits of marriage, motherhood and the Toronto subway system--can Alice find her way into a purpose-driven life? Or will it all be one giant hangover?
     
    [*Wattpad Editor's Pick 2018*]
    
    [[word count: 70,000-80,000 words]]
     
    Readers say:
    "This had me laughing so loud that my sister came to check up on me to see if I'm OK!!!"
    "...the new Bridget Jones, a working woman's take on the digital age."
      
    About the Author:
    Working mother, annoying vegetarian and red wine enthusiast, Renee lives in Toronto with her flawed but wonderful family (seriously, who left socks on the kitchen counter?) in a flawed but wonderful house (what *is* that smell in the basement?).

title: All Good Things

Description:
WATTPAD BOOKS EDITION
    
    Bringing us into a world of unrelenting suspense, Olivia Harvard's astonishing debut explores the ravages of grief and betrayal through the eyes of a teenage boy coping with a heartbreaking loss and its revelations . . .   
    
    The unthinkable has happened: Colton Crest is dead. And Elliot, Colton's best friend, is the one who finds him brutally murdered. As Elliot struggles to put the pieces of his shattered life back together, Colton's funeral only brings more confusion and heartbreak. 
    
    Someone has placed a note in Elliot's pocket claiming to be Colton's killer. And in a sickening twist, they offer to provide a series of clues that will help Elliot find out their identity. 
    
    Consumed with rage and grief, Elliot has no choice but to follow where the confessions lead. But with each new revelation, it becomes clear that Colton had a strange and secret other life. Elliot isn't sure of anything anymore. Is he tracking down the killer? Or is the killer tracking him? In his search for the truth, Elliot vows to see this sick game to the end, no matter the cost.

title: Confessions About Colton (Wattpad Books Edition)

Description:
WATTPAD BOOKS EDITION 
    
    Griffin Tomlin is dead. And Clara's sister killed him . . .  
    
    Four months after the murder, the entire town of Shiloh is still in shock. For Clara Porterfield, the normal world has crumbled around her in a million chaotic pieces. Now Clara lives in a new reality, where her sister awaits trial for murder, her mother obsessively digs in a dead, frozen garden, and her father lives and breathes denial. At school, Clara is haunted by her classmates' morbid curiosity-and all of the unspoken questions they won't ask. 
    
    But none of them knows what she knows . . .
    
    Now Clara's sister wants something from her-the one thing in all of this that Clara isn't ready to face: the truth about what really happened that night. Because this story didn't die with Griffin Tomlin. There's another story that needs to be told. And sometimes, the lies we're told are nowhere near as deadly as the lies we tell ourselves . . .

Description:
When Jane Madarang's neighbor Natalie kills herself and leaves behind cryptic instructions, it's up to Jane and her classmates to unearth deadly secrets. 
     
                                                                          *****
     
    Natalie Driscoll is dead.
    
    She threw herself out a window and left her neighbor Jane to unravel their town's darkest secrets. Following Natalie's instructions leads Jane to three other high school students who all have something to hide. The four of them must carry out Natalie's final errand while solving the mysteries written in her diary. But the secrets they unearth may be far more dangerous than what they ever imagined.
    
    Content and/or trigger warning: This story contains scenes of suicide, violence and murder that may be triggering for some readers.
    
    [[word count: 100,000-150,000 words]]

title: Natalie's Diary

Description:
Evelyn Cruz is a driven young career woman who sees love as a disaster waiting to happen. She wants to focus on her goals, save her money, and somehow make a name for herself in this world. 
    
    But there's another side to her ambition. She throws herself into her work, refusing to break for even a moment so that she has no time to . . . think. To think about what's missing, what should be there . . . but isn't. What is it? Who is . . . he? 
    
    The man in her dream. The one who looks just like . . . the man on the cover of the brochure for the cruise she gets invited to, all-expenses-paid. Limbo Cruises, owned by mysterious brothers Collin and Vance Limb. They want something from Eve; why else would they go to such lengths to persuade her to join them on one of their cruises? 
    
    Evelyn isn't sure if she should go. It would mean taking a week off of work to . . . relax. But the name Collin is ringing a bell and Eve wants answers. Why can't she remember? What do the brothers want with her? The only way to find out is by going on their cruise.

title: The Space Between Love And Hell

Description:
WATTPAD BOOKS EDITION.
    
    The past always resurfaces . . .
    
    Five years after almost drowning, Olivia Cathart returns home to Caldwell Beach determined
    to face her fears and take some risks-not just by swimming but by opening her heart. Hoping
    to rekindle her friendships, she's excited about a carefree summer with her best friends Keely
    and Miles. But life in the sleepy town has changed, and no one and nothing is as it seems.
    
    When a series of startling crimes threaten Olivia's fragile state, she is plunged into a terrifying
    game of cat and mouse. Her only solace from the chaos is West, Miles's disowned and
    ruggedly handsome brother, but even he can't answer the question on everyone's minds-is
    Olivia really in danger or is it simply all in her head?

Description:
I used to feel so simple and free
    When you'd remained so close to me
    You've now left me with memories
    Memories that's turned into reveries
    
    *   *   *   *   *   *   *
    
    When Wolf meets her lover after about ten years of both of them being separated from each other, she does not seem quite surprised to find herself telling each and every one of the stories of their adventures together all over again, to recover precious old memories of gold and hemlock that had been hopelessly forgotten within just fleeting moments when something rather unfortunate had happened earlier.
    
    Now, the only question both these lovers have, deep down within each of their own souls, is that is it really possible for those lost reveries to be recovered from just storytelling?
    
    Yes, it's absolutely possible...

Description:
Before the split, Chu Naiyun was a high-quality student in everyone's eyes, and a college bully with the most potential to split into alpha.
    
    After the split, Chu Naiyun was careful not to be found out as an omega, so he decisively broke off contact with all his classmates after graduating from high school, and started life with a new identity.
    
    Even if I knew from birth that I was going to differentiate into an omega, I couldn't let go of the brilliance before the differentiation, and forcibly made my new life worse.
    
    Life is like countless basins of cold water, splashing him beyond recognition. Aspirations are hard to repay, and love is frustrated.
    
    When the doctor told him that the inhibitors were useless to him, he was crushed to death at the last straw, and he let himself go directly. Why should he wrong himself? But who will tell him why the alpha he met looks exactly like his high school classmates?
    
    *+ Beginners: Regular pregnancy check-ups are required.

Description:
Ye Tan and her nominal "husband" Ashley are married in a political marriage, and they have no feelings for each other.
    
    Therefore, even if she knows that Ashley is messing around outside, she doesn't care.
    
    Until the day of her rebirth, Ye Tan differentiated from a weak omega to an alpha, and she could finally break free from all shackles and get what she wanted.
    
    Political marriage... fuck off.
    
    Things are going in an increasingly strange direction.
    
    Green Tea No. 1, who was supposed to be tied to Ashley to death, hung on Ye Tan's body with moist eyes, crying, "Sorry, I spilled the wine on you, I'll wipe it for you."
    
    Originally Green Tea No. 2, who is supposed to be lingering with Ashley, had countless chance encounters with Ye Tan intentionally or unintentionally.
    
    The fate that should have been entangled with Ashley all found Yetan, and even the way her old enemy looked at her began to become ambiguous.
    
    Ye Tan: "..."
    
    I don't want it, I refuse!
    
    Des has always been Ye Tan's deadly enemy, no matter in her previous life or now.
    
    The two fell in love and killed each other, from full of hostility to sympathy.
    
    After rebirth, Ye Tan originally wanted to take Des under her command, but suddenly discovered a secret after getting drunk.
    
    In the room, the smell of pheromones is everywhere. Des blushed and said inarticulately: "I like you, it doesn't matter if you are an O."
    
    Ye Tan: "..." I didn't expect that! The little pigtail was caught, and she wanted to catch that omega, threatening... the last thing that was spit out was the two words that lingered between her lips and teeth, Ye Tan.
    
    Ye Tan's face is confused: "..."

title: Me and my nemesis? [Female A Male O]

Description:
Imperial Princess Zhao Zhufu.

The biggest mistake of her life was being stabbed by her most trusted consort on the eve of her coronation.

It is said that the princess had a cruel Alpha personality, delighting in tormenting her consort every day. The consort had been harboring resentment for a long time, watching her strive for the throne for a whole twenty years. On the day before her coronation, he finally avenged his deep grudge.

Zhao Zhufu: This is all just rumors.

She remembered his slightly curved lips, his long and thick eyelashes, and the cold phoenix eyes that turned red in passion. She also remembered the trembling voice that called her name.

In her short yet long life, she had clearly given all her love to that beautiful and cold Omega.

Zhao Zhufu: If I could start over in this life, I would have killed him the moment we met.

So, Zhao Zhufu returned to her eighteen-year-old self.

She didn't feel discouraged by her penniless situation starting from scratch. She decided to reclaim the throne and eliminate her villainous siblings.

And it was at that time, during a state banquet, that a man sent as a gift from an enemy nation lay in a cage.

He had a high fever, his sight was taken away, and he was barely alive.

Simultaneously, due to the effects of drugs, his face was covered with a sickly flush, and his lifeless eyes shed tears in passion.

His convulsing body seemed like an invitation and a plea.

Zhao Zhufu, smelling the hint of cream from his pheromones, reluctantly spoke to her villainous family:

"Father Emperor, I want this gift."

...Compared to ascending to the throne, killing her former consort seemed imminent.

[Haughty Super Alpha Young Empress X Blindly Loyal Omega Former General]

Description:
As a female Alpha, Nan Fu is always physically uncomfortable with the sweet taste of Omega, and every susceptibility period is equivalent to a hell-level test.

Fortunately, her good brother Jiang Yu is also an Alpha, and he will always help her in various ways.

She is very reassuring about him.

Unexpectedly, one day, Nan Fu woke up from Jiang Yu and found that his good brother had turned into an Omega overnight.

Looking at Jiang Yu's smooth and fair neck, her face was red and white, and the alpha's instinctive possessive desire in her body was about to move.

Nan Fu finally couldn't hold back, panting and asked him, "Why are you pretending to be A?"

Jiang Yu's voice was still a little hoarse, but he still raised his head, his eyes were red, his Adam's apple was moving, and he spit out two words clearly.

"Hook you."

Jiang Yu, the bully of No. 7 Middle School, has a good family background and good looks, but unfortunately he has a surly personality, and no one dares to provoke him.

Until the second year of high school, a transfer student came to the class. She looked skinny and lonely, but her eyes were very light when looking at anyone.

He obviously dismissed it, but he longed for other emotions when these eyes looked at her.

So he ignored the back road, damaged the glands to install A, and took special medicine to make his pheromones bitter.

For this reason, step by step, paranoid to the bone, there is no cure.

At first, he just wanted to tame the man.

Later, he found himself tamed.

title: Female Alpha's Paranoid Male O

Description:
Ji Xiao is a top A with gray wolf blood, and her pheromones are extremely aggressive.
    
        Before joining the job, she repeatedly assured her family that she would restrain her powerful Alpha pheromone and would never cause any trouble.
    
        As a result, on the night of joining the company, Ji Xiao bumped into an Omega who unexpectedly had a fever in the lounge.
    
        At that time, the lounge was filled with rich white peach-flavored pheromones. The man's cold eyes were darkened by the water vapor, his fair face was flushed red, the rabbit's snow-white ears drooped pitifully, and the pink glands on the back of his neck exposed.
    
        Ji Xiao couldn't control it...
    
        She marked the person.
    
        The next day, when the company held a meeting, Ji Xiao met the man again.
    
        The little white rabbit from last night is now sitting in the center of the room in a suit and leather shoes.
    
        Look at the famous brand again, "Lu Qiming", the CEO of Yuechen.
    
        Ji Xiao: ...
    
        Did she mark her immediate boss?
    
        That afternoon, Ji Xiao's mother asked her, how did she adapt to the new company? How is the boss? Do you get along well?
    
        At this moment, Ji Xiao looked down at the huge sum of money that had just been remitted on the mobile phone. The remitter was Lu Qiming, with a message attached, "Hush money, let's pretend that what happened last night never happened."
    
        Ji Xiao immediately trembled. Picking up the phone, she sent a message to her mother with a guilty conscience,
    
        "Mom, it's very good... The boss is also good, he just sent me... a bonus."
    
        After the accidental mark, the two of them tacitly agreed, never mentioned that matter again...

Description:
Scarlett and Nate are the epitome of "right person, wrong time", and two years after their one night together, Scarlett sees him interviewing for his album about the night they met in order to find her, and she finds herself taking the chance she didn't two years ago.
    
          *****
    
    When Scarlett's dad dies during her senior year of college, all she wants is to be someone else for one night. When she meets a mysterious boy, that seems entirely possible. They both agree that for the next few hours, they're 'Quinn' and 'Mason'. But to truly let go and not worry about their futures, they vow to never see each other again. Two years later, Scarlett owns a bakery in New York City and is living her dream. But despite all of this, she's never been able to let 'Mason' go, and a part of her regrets their vow to never see each other again. So, when she sees 'Mason', who turns out to be the up-and-coming singer Nate Cameron, on her television interviewing for his debut album "Quinn", with songs about the night they met, she knows she has to take the chance she didn't take two years ago.
    
    Watty's Romance Winner 2021
    Being published by W by Wattpad Books
    
    Book One of the "Just For" Series.
    Approximately 80k words

And to top it all off, the local rich boy, Isaac Royal, is adamant about making her life hell. Surrounded by rumors, lies, and a secret keeping the town on edge, Nova has to figure out why she's hated and why the boy hell-bent on making her suffer seems to be the only person she can trust.

title: Twilight Witch

Description:
The Smith Organization helps rogues of every supernatural species by being their pack to prevent them from going crazy. They accept witches, werewolves, vampires, all of them. The Alpha Kings of the world hate them for protecting the witches who are powerful but rare, especially the Alpha King of North and South America. Though, to the humans, they are a simple criminal mafia
    Emma is the daughter of Ava Smith, one of the creators of the Organization. She is now twenty years old and has been in charge since she was eighteen. 
    A normal recon mission goes badly when the Alpha King finds her scent and recognizes it as his mate's. He catches her, but doesn't know her true identity. Emma also hates the Alpha Kings with a passion for killing her surrogate fathers, Josh and Chris.
    Can she keep he pretense of being someone she is not?
    Will her hate overwhelm the love?
    How can Emma get herself out of this tricky situation?
    Will her brothers come and save her?

title: The Smith Organization

Description:
[WATTY'S 2022 SHORTLIST!] Marley Miller and Daniel Gold grew up going to camp together. They experienced each other's awkward teenage years, pulled pranks together, and even were each other's first... well... everything. After nearly four years of losing touch, the two accidentally run into each on the first day of their senior year of college. 
    
    Marley learned how to build walls to protect her emotions, shutting herself out from her closest relationships. Daniel was the opposite, having no problem opening himself up to those he loved. The two seemed no longer compatible, discovering lies about the other and figuring out they were not the same as they were as kids. As time went on, the two of them realized that in order to truly move on, they would need to fight their battles on their own. 
    
    Will Marley and Daniel ever figure out how to become the best friends they used to be, or have the years changed them for good?

title: Cabin Tales

Description:
The Order of the Phoenix is ready to take Harry away from the Dursleys before his fifth year at Hogwarts, but the mission is cut short when Harry receives a mysterious letter claiming to be him from the future.
    
    As everyone is transported to the Room of Requirement to learn about Harry's life, new romances start to flare, stories are shared, and secrets from the past are revealed.
    
    Is Harry going to meet Voldemort much earlier than planned? Is a friend of Harry's going to betray him, like Peter Pettigrew did to his parents? Will the future change; wrongs turned to right? Or will messing with time bring dreadful results...

title: Reliving the Past, Present, and Future

Description:
|COMPLETED|
    
    "Michael Langwood has Wattpad," I repeated and smirked at him, trying not to laugh.
    
    "I told you it's NOT my account," he grunted, "It's a friend's who stopped using it so he passed it to me and -"
    
    "Shhh," I pressed my finger on his lips, making him flinch, "I won't tell anyone about your Wattpad account and well, book. But there is a teeny tiny problem. They're kind of posted on the school's website..."
    
    "What?!"
    ______
    
    Bree Hayland is a seventeen year-old Wattpad addict with no real social life. Other than spending hours writing and surfing through the app called Wattpad, she blogs on her school's website. 
    
    Michael Langwood is Eagle High's hedonistic bad boy. He has godly looks, popularity, and a major reputation to keep.
    
    But when Bree accidentally stumbles upon his most embarrassing secret, she can't let that go unnoticed. She seeks revenge for Michael's past behavior towards her, and she knows exactly how to get it...
    
    ...But the question is, at what cost?
    
    A story filled with humorous incidents, awkward moments, and even a tint of romance. 
    _____
    
    ~Winner of The Literary Awards 2017

Description:
24 Hours in Paris is now published as a Paperback & E-book by W by Wattpad Books (this story is also now available on YONDER, your next-generation reading
    app from the Wattpad family. Join me on YONDER today by downloading the app for iOS or Android)!
    
    As a Wattpad reader, you can now access both the Original Edition and the W by Wattpad Books Published Edition here upon purchase (PS: a review on Amazon (and also Goodreads) would be very much appreciated, to help get this POC rom com in front of more readers! All the review page links are on my Wattpad profile page :-) )
    
    In the new Published Edition of the book, the characters of Mira and Jake will be older and wiser co-workers in the corporate world, who miss their flight and get stuck spending an extra 24 hours in Paris. They'll start off annoyed with each other, but you know how the story goes...
    
    "Adorably sweet and a brilliant read! It made me feel like I was roaming the streets of Paris without having to leave my couch." - Grace @HQ
    
    Mira finds herself stuck in the city of love with Jake, the playboy athlete she can't stand. What she doesn't expect is for major sparks to fly on their 24-hour adventure. But can this newly-found love last beyond the magic of Paris?
    
                                           ***** 
    
    On the last day of their class's college trip to Paris, Mira and Jake get tangled up in a debacle that causes them to miss their flight home to New York. Which means they're stuck in Paris until the next available flight that's 24 hours away! Mira is witty and a lover of art history and good cheese. Jake, on the other hand, is your All-American frat boy with a killer smile. Translation: they can't stand each other. 
    
    As they visit places they could never have imagined, Mira and Jake go from mortal enemies to star-crossed lovers with sizzling chemistry. But can their spark last without Paris' cheese and charm to keep it going?
    
    [[word count: 50,000-60,000 words]]
    Cover designed by Ray Gardener

title: 24 Hours in Paris

Description:
WATTPAD BOOKS EDITION. 
    
    Love is a chemical reaction.
    
    When Jordan Hughes arrives at Pinecrest High School, Elliot Goldman's graduating year suddenly gets a lot more interesting. Smart, good looking and charming, Jordan isn't exactly the kind of person Elliot's used to having as a lab partner. But when they start acing their assignments, life is suddenly about more than boring lectures, bad cafeteria nachos, or relentless bullying, and for the first time ever, Elliot can't wait to get to chemistry class. 
    
    As they start spending more time together outside of school, Elliot realizes he's never met anyone quite like Jordan. And then everything changes one night when Jordan kisses him, making Elliot question everything about their relationship and about himself. The butterflies start to make sense-the trouble is, right now, nothing else does. 
    
    Love was the last thing on Elliot's mind. But as he begins to figure out how he really feels about Jordan, he realizes that sometimes the last thing you are looking for is the one thing you need the most.

title: Still With Me

Description:
Accused of an assault he doesn't remember, Ricky's senior year is made doubly complicated when he falls for the victim's best friend, Olivia - his only alibi.
                                                                   ***
    Growing up among New York's high society seems glamorous from the outside, but looks can be deceiving. 17-year-old Ricky, who's cultivated a long list of rumors because of his bad boy behavior, knows this first-hand.
    But when he's wrongly accused of sexually assaulting a classmate, things take a turn. Especially when discovering the victim's best friend, Olivia, is his only alibi.
    With feelings quickly growing stronger between them, Ricky can't help falling for Olivia's kind nature, yet complications lurk around every corner, made worse still by the dark secret Ricky's been hiding for years, and his biggest fear is someone uncovering the truth behind the bad rumors.
    What will happen to Olivia and Ricky when the secret finally comes out? It's a long way down from high society to rock bottom.
    
    Content Warning: This story is a depiction of real life. It, therefore, contains mature content in the form of sexual assault, explicit language, violence (involving minors), sex, drinking, and drug use. Just like real life does. By continuing, you understand you'll be reading themes of a more mature nature, and that some might be triggering. (16+)

    "Great details and descriptions throughout the story."
    "I love the unexpected twists, turns, and non-clich√© characters."
    "I hope a lot of people will take that chance to read your story, it is really worth it."

    Nicknames, a love of soccer, and school rumors are all the bad boy and the tomboy have in common. But if they give each other a chance, will they find something more?
    
                                                                          *****
    
    Seventeen-year-old Macy Anderson is a tomboy that plays soccer, hangs with the guys, can't stand girls (except her best friend Jasmine) and doesn't know who Sam Cahill is. But when the pair unexpectedly meet, everything goes downhill from there. Because Sam Cahill is the school's bad boy, known for skipping classes and getting into trouble. Not to mention his cocky attitude, British accent, and magnetic charm, which seems to work on all the girls -- except Macy, who has a rule not date in high school. But when Sam starts showing her his moves (on and off the soccer field), Macy begins to see a different guy under the leather-clad exterior. Will that be enough to convince her that he's the one guy worth breaking the rules for?

Description:
The only thing Mia Hope has in common with Jake Carpenter, Artwood High's most popular quarterback, is a love for the coffee served at The Coffee Pod. He wants her to tutor him - and if she can do it without a single cup of coffee, he'll pay her triple. Easy. Nothing could go wrong, right? 
    
                                                                        *****
    
    When Jake learns he's failing English, he knows he needs to pull his grades up or he'll risk being kicked off the football team. He strikes a deal with the elusive Mia - the quiet girl with secrets. If she can't go without a single cup of coffee, she has to tutor him for free. If she can, he'll pay her triple, and with Christmas around the corner, there's nothing Mia needs more than money. But as the pair grow closer, Jake learns the real reason for Mia's bad habit, and what starts as an innocent bet between enemies grows into something more serious. Can the pair survive the next two months with their hearts - and secrets - still intact?

title: The QB Bad Boy and Me - Wattpad Books Edition

Description:
WATTPAD BOOKS EDITION
    
    There are imperfect moments in every life-but sometimes, there are perfect accidents . . .  
     
    What's the point of pretending nothing has changed when everything has? It's the last summer before college, and Jonas Avery knows he should be excited. Instead, he hides out at home, avoiding his friends, his family, and everything that resembles his old life. Because nothing will be normal again-because of The Accident, when everything started falling apart.
    
    Brennan Davis knows she needs to stand up and face her anxiety-the deep, dark, debilitating dread that rules her everyday life. Because what stops her from going out into the world and just living is going to get a whole lot worse. She's leaving for college in the fall, where she'll be confronted with even more to worry about.
    
    To get back up sometimes you have to fall down, hard . . . 
    
    When Jonas crashes into Brennan-in a harmless, albeit embarrassing fender bender-the two teens connect in ways they never expected. As friends, they help each other overcome their biggest falls and faults, and soon discover that while love can't fix everything, it's sometimes a place to start.
     
    Sensitive, wry, and unabashedly authentic, The Opposite of Falling Apart isn't about finding perfection in another person or fixing the things we think are broken. Instead, Micah Good has penned an enchantingly honest novel about accepting the very pieces of ourselves that make us unique, whole, and undeniably human.

title: The Opposite of Falling Apart

Description:
Maddie can't remember the last 2 years, but she knows Ethan is the handsome boy who's been haunting her dreams. Do they have an insta-spark, or a past?
    
    ***
    
    When a skiing accident leaves sixteen-year-old Maddie Monroe with a brain injury, erasing all her memories from the past two years, her personality undergoes a massive transformation. Long gone is the carefree girl she used to be, and old friends feel like complete strangers. One of the strangest side effects the accident leaves her with are her dreams -- or more specifically, the boy who plagues them. She has no idea who he is, but he comes to her most nights; handsome, funny and charming as hell. When he shows up seated beside her in English class one day, she feels an instant connection to him - and as their relationship develops, Maddie can't help but feel like there's a hidden past between them. Have they met before? Who is Ethan Ryder?
    
    [[word count: 60,000-70,000 words]]

Description:
Deadly assassins Allegra and Ace have been trying in vain to kill each other for years. With a mutual enemy threatening their mafias, they find themselves in an unexpected alliance, and soon discover killing each other isn't the only temptation they need to resist...
    
                                                                          *****
    
    Allegra Grey is poised to be the next great American mafia leader, and she's more than living up to the name. A skilled assassin, there's only one target who's ever gotten away from her-suave, sinfully handsome Ace De Luca, heir to the Italian mafia and the Greys' biggest rival. When both mafias are faced with a dangerous threat, they're forced to work together to protect their families, and unexpected sparks fly. Allegra definitely isn't one to sleep with the enemy, especially an arrogant womanizer like Ace. But there's an undeniable electricity between them and Allegra's not sure it's all hatred. Ace may be bad news, but Allegra's never been afraid of a little danger. As the fire they're playing with grows to a scorching blaze, one thing is clear: trying to kill each other may have been difficult, but resisting this intense chemistry will be impossible.

Description:
Mafia Bright X Baker Win
    
    Bright Vachirawit, the famous mafia leader well-known as "Beast," has been looking for his mate for seven years. His search ends when one day, he finds his mate, a baker who is about to close his small bakery. His expectations fall into bits when he sees how innocent and sweet the boy looks.
    
    "I can't believe I've been searching for him all these years."
    
    Yet, an invisible attachment grew in his heart towards the baker, Win Metawin.
    
    "I don't know who he is. He might be a gold digger, a rat, or even a big threat to me."
    
    "What is your plan?"
    
    "Get hold of a ring that stops pheromones. I know what exactly to do."
    
    Bright goes in disguise to get close to his mate, as well as to know if Win is a bad person or not. But the journey doesn't seem to be smooth.

Description:
"Banyak yang bisa terjadi dalam seminggu."

_Jeno Lee


Seminggu.

Selama itulah yang akan dihabiskan Karina Yu di Suwon demi menghadiri pernikahan sahabatnya, Giselle. Tiga tahun lalu dia membuat skandal besar di kota kelahirannya itu, dan sejak saat itu dia pindah ke kota besar dan bersumpah tidak akan pernah kembali. Sampai sekarang. Tapi seminggu terasa bagai selamanya, dengan semua mata haus gosip yang mengawasi gerak-geriknya, ditambah sepasang mata tajam milik Jeno Lee yang senantiasa mengusiknya...

Selama itu jugalah waktu yang dibutuhkan Jeno untuk memikat Karina. Sejak awal gadis itu menunjukkan dirinya lain daripada yang lain. Pakaiannya, pembawaannya, dan cara Karina melahap stroberi bersalut-cokelat-tiga-lapis ke mulutnya... Ya Tuhan. Jeno tahu dia harus mendapatkan Karina. Meyakinkan Karina bahwa tempat gadis itu adalah di sini, di kota kecil ini, di sisinya.











Remake from sensational novel by Sandra Brown

Description:
Maurice and Elisha have been high school sweethearts since 10th grade. The definition of black love but they would be lying if they claimed it was all rainbows and smiles. You will have to read on to find out the tea. 
    
    David and Larissa met around the same time, 10th grade. They are deeply in love interracial couple but everybody aint happy for them and it's made their relationship extremely difficult. Will their love conquer all? 
    
    Kendra is a shy, smart girl who happens to be single. She admires the relationships her friends Elisha and Larissa have. She is trying to find herself this year. Trying to find out where she fits into the world, what does she want? And who does she want? And does he want her??
    
    Jason is a white, wide receiver for the Mount Rainier football team. He's formed a friendship with Reese and David, his fellow teammates. Jason is strong, with a no-nonsense attitude but has a big heart, despite his difficult childhood. He has dreams of going to college and being a biomedical engineer. He is single but has his sights on a girl, but doesn't know if she feels the same. He's never been shy but when it comes to her, he is. Will Jason get the girl of his dreams? Will Jason be able to confront his past trauma?

This is the story of Vedanth and Jwala who are totally opposite in behavior, family background and interests....

Description:
As a young boy, Kylo Ren trained with his uncle Luke Skywalker as a padawan. Years before his betrayal, he witnesses his uncle have a vision of a young girl, particularly strong with the force, who bears a mark that will enable him to know her when he finds her. Long after the massacre of his fellow padawans, Kylo continues to search for her even in the midst of controlling the First Order. 
    
    Serela has grown up her entire life on the lush, wild planet of Takodana. Kept unaware of so much from the outside world, she has no idea how powerful she is with the force, or what lengths Kylo Ren will go to in order to find her and harness her powers. Both are ignorant of the prophecy which bonds both of their fates together inextricably and that the fate of the galaxy hinges upon the two of them.
    
    He hopes to find her and change her to his side, the question is, who will change who?

title: Two teachers one student (Teacher Ace x Reader x Teacher Sabo)

Description:
Harry had been a lot of things in his life, but happy hadn't been one of them for a very long time. He and Jasper loved each other. The wolves trusted Harry to be the middle man between themselves and the Coven. Bree was learning to be her own person with Rosalie and Emmett's support. Edward and Bella were about to get married (too absorbed in each other to annoy Harry). Carlisle and Esme were thrilled to see their family as close as it had ever been (despite Harry avoiding them often), while Alice bathed in the happiness of her family. 
    
    Everything seemed so peaceful. 
    
    Mortuus was still a thorn in his side, but he was growing annoyingly fond of that thorn. 
    
    What Harry hadn't been expecting was a series of unpredictable events that would lead to him actually standing up for and defending Bella Swan. Oh, and having to tear down another stupid and arbitrary government. But when you're Harry Potter, what else could you really expect?
    
    Sequel to My Soul, Your Heart. 
    The shits and giggles continue I guess.

title: My Heart, Your Soul

Description:
Mia had given up all hope after being captured by a group of human scientists at a young age, subjected to years of torturous testing from those who wanted to find out more about her kind. 
    
    Werewolves. 
    
    But what happens when Alpha Lorenzo, her mate, a strong and possessive Italian Alpha, rescues her, bringing her to safety? Will Mia struggle to adjust? 
    
    Especially since an impulsive and reckless witch wants revenge over a past mistake, and will stop at nothing to rip Mia and Lorenzo apart. 
    
    Will Mia cope when discovering that she can't trust the people she thought she could? Or will the world seem to crumble down beneath her?

    Jade Grogan, the youngest millionaire in the city among his other two brothers, is nothing but trouble in paradise. With the looks that could kill and have any girl he wanted; he is an arrogant jerk with a past so painful that it still aches inside of him. The charm he holds is inevitable for anyone. His arrogance and ego are nothing but a facade that he shows to the world, just to keep the walls he has built around him. But when it comes to a certain dark-haired therapist, he can't resist breaking those walls by himself.
    
    Aurora Monroe, a successful and famous therapist residing in Canada, is beautiful, elegant, and has a shine to her personality. She meets so many people in her daily life who need to be listened to and healed, maintaining her strict professionalism. No one knows about her own demons, which haunt her every day. But when it comes to a certain new patient, she is drawn towards him, no matter how much she denies it.
    
    They meet out of pure professional necessity. But little did they know that their fates were connected.

title: Say You Swear

Description:
"I don't believe that untouchable act you've got going for a minute by the way. You can't be this calm and collected about everything."
    
    
    Seth the tracker had a wee bit of a reputation. One he was proud of, thank you very much. So what if he was a loud-mouthed, inappropriate, immature waste of space? He was content with his way of living. He had no need for change.
    
    
    "Not everyone loses their head the way you do."
    
    
    When one wrong deed goes a jot too far, his name falls on the radar of an immortal badass eager to drag him to his judgement. Eager to see him punished. Seth loved a good old punishment-but nothing gave him a run for his money quite like her.
    
    
    "I don't lose my head. A freakout every now and then is good for you."
    
    
    With a devastating war close on the horizons, Seth the tracker finds himself working at the very heart of it, working off his crimes.
    
    Only a woman could give him this kind of hell.
    
    
    "I don't need to freakout. I'm quite fine with the calm I already have."

Description:
Lacey never planned on breaking rule number two, but she did. When she signed a contract with Vincent Powers, she never expected it to fall in love with him, but did.
    
    Now that they're together, Lacey helps Vincent deal with his health crisis, all the while settling into an actual relationship that neither experienced.
    
    What happens when Lacey's past returns and refuses to let her go freely? Will Vincent be able to save her in time, or will he lose his only chance at happiness?
    
    Sometimes love is worth the risk.
    
    Sequel to The Businessman's Escort

    Began 9/27/2016
    
    Highest ranking: #2 in twists
    
    *COMPLETED*
    
    Katlyn and Clayton's son is growing up. Kaden Ravenwolf must find himself in his pack. The alpha title will soon be given to him and he must fight the aggressiveness buried in him. Will he find a mate? And if so, will she be able to put up with him?
    
    ***
    
    I scrambled away from him and pulled myself to my feet ignoring the pain. I looked into his cold eyes.
    
    "I hate you." I spat wiping the tears from my eyes.
    
    His chest heaved up and down and soon I was pinned against the wall. I tried to push him away but he wouldn't budge.
    
    "I could reject you." I growled and he dug his fingers in my skin.
    
    "I could kill you." He snarled and pushed me harder into the wall.
    
    "Then do it." I spat.

title: His Only One

Description:
Sophia is sat in a bar with only a large glass of wine for company, quietly nursing a broken heart. When a charismatic stranger approaches her, he's not only confidently funny, smart and intriguing... he's undeniably attractive.
    That night, for the first time in a very long while, Sophia feels womanly and wanted.
    This mysterious stranger not only makes her laugh, he ignites something within the very unwanted parts of herself. He ignites something that makes her willingly want to go against all that she thinks she is.
    
                                                                   ~
    
    Cade Lapley is a ruthless barrister: equally so in his personal life.
    He is suave, sophisticated and wealthy, with emotional baggage almost as big as his oversized ego. When he meets the just dumped, Sophia Hale, he finds himself inexplicably drawn to her. He is feeling something, and Cade Lapley just doesn't do feelings of any kind. 
    Yet somehow, this lost-looking woman ignites something within him; a place that has been dark and uncaring ever since he was a little boy. He knows he is playing with an emotional fire, and will more than likely only get his fingers badly burnt.
    Yet still, Cade finds himself unable to leave this woman alone. 
    He knows he should. Not only for Sophia's sake, but more selfishly for his.
    Only, he can't.
    
    One man. One woman. Together.... Ignitable.
    
    ***DOES CONTAIN SWEAR WORDS & SCENES OF INTIMATE AND GRAPHIC NATURE***
    
    
    IGNITABLE
    Published by K B Mallion
    Copyright ¬© 2017 K B Mallion

title: Ignitable

Description:
Wattpad 2023 Amby's Top Pick ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ I have to admit it... I never got over Giovanni. I thought I had moved on, even married another man. But just when I had my life all neatly put together, it all broke apart. Now I'm nearly thirty, freshly single, and living back home with my mom in California, where the hot and heavy teenage memories of Gio still taunt me.
    
    Then, as if by fate, after eleven years of no contact, he walks back into my life, his gaze licking up my body like fire, and Zap! All it takes is one look to feel the intense connection surging between us again... and I know he feels it, too. Damn, Gio was hot at seventeen, but now he's the souped-up, modified version.
    
    Anyone can tell I'd give anything to get back together with him, but every time my heart leaps forward, he immediately takes two steps back. I know him well enough to sense he's keeping something hidden behind those gorgeous, enigmatic eyes, but I'm keeping a secret from him, too. 
    
    I'm so afraid that the way we each are broken could be our final deal breaker. What will it take to get him back? And if I do, am I really ready for the man he is now?
    
    Logline: Ex-lovers Ren and Gio are thrust back into an elevator together by sheer fate. She thinks she's broken beyond repair. He thinks he's a train wreck unfit for relationships. Their chemistry is immediate, but in order to fully heal their relationship and themselves, they must first reveal their deepest secrets. 
    
    Tropes: Second Chance, Soulmate Chemistry, High School Sweethearts, He's Quiet and Complicated, Flashbacks, Spicy Scenes, Suspense Romance, Neurodivergent Characters
    
    
    2023 Amby Awards Winner - Top Pick in Romance
    ü•á 1st Place Winner in the Fluorescence Awards 2023
    ü•à 2nd Place Winner in the Wonder Awards 2023
    
    
    Fate Interrupted - 2023

title: Fate Interrupted

Description:
It was like coming home.
    
    Simon wasn't prepared for the intensity of her kiss. It hit him hard, sucking out all the breath in his lungs. For a moment he was overwhelmed, and then need overtook him.
    
    He reached for her, his hand tangling in her hair as he slanted his mouth, pushing hers wider, suddenly desperate for more access to her. 
    
    The kiss lacked any finesse. It was just plain need, need so deep he felt it to the depth of his soul. It was the kind of need that lacked a clear definition, a need that had him drinking her in desperately. 
    
    There was only her. There would only be her. No woman would ever be able to measure up to her. It just wasn't possible. She was it for him. Forever.
    
    God, he loved her. 
    
    ***
    All rights reserved.

title: Sweet Little Pains

Description:
Winnie Morrow had spent much of her life torn between a custody battle; jumping between her mother's, her father's, and foster parents more times than she'd care to count. Her need for her father's love, far from the bitterness of her mother, finds her in Charming; past hidden by the thin veil of smoke, and future determined by the distinct leather of the Sons. She returns for a home, and family; and finds so much more in the softness of a Scotsman.
    --

B·∫£o L∆∞u M·ªçi Quy·ªÅn

Tyler and Mia have been best friends since elementary school. They've been through a lot together, including giving each other their first kiss and Mia losing her virginity to him. That night changes everything and Mia finds herself struggling to maintain their friendship. She tries to move on but Tyler is always there. He doesn't want to be with her but he doesn't want anyone else to be either. Throughout her struggle, Mia learns more about herself and meets many new people. But will any of that matter if she loses her best friend?
    
    "What is wrong with you?" Mia asks in disbelief.
    
    
    Tyler sighs, crossing his arms over his chest.
    "I don't do relationships. You know that," he replies, shrugging slightly.
    
    
    Mia contemplates what to do. She has two choices:
    1.) Walk away and never look back, meaning she'd lose him.
    Or
    2.) Forget anything ever happened and allow him to continue walking all over her, meaning she wouldn't lose him.
    
    
    Either way, she'd be the one getting hurt.
    
    
    "Then I don't 'do' this friendship anymore. Goodbye, Tyler."
    
    
    {The first 5 chapters are published on Wattpad as a preview. The story is 100% complete & published on another platform (more info in my bio). HOWEVER, I fully publish them on Wattpad at random times throughout the year to give you all a chance to read my stories here. If you follow me & add the story to your library, you will get a notification when I republish them here. Thank you all for your support!}

Description:
Nolan, an unapproachable guy who ignores the existence of all his schoolmates, sleeps in all of his classes. Normally, this wouldn't be Chelsea Arnold's problem--she does her best to pay attention in class and attends gym like a good, normal student.
    
    Unfortunately, she just so happens to be his assigned desk partner in many classes. She's frequently forced to wake him in English class and ends up earning the unofficial title of Nolan's Wake-up Alarm--a title that nobody in the entire school covets. The last thing she wants is to interact with him more than she absolutely has to. One day, their gym teacher sends her to bring him back to class, which he always skips for some reason. When she accidentally shines her flashlight in his sleeping face, it triggers a chain of events that gradually intertwines their lives together.
    
    It's hard to be a normal student when you start befriending the school oddball. It doesn't help that he has more secrets than the Big Ben has stairs.
    -----
    Complete. (first person, past tense, slowburn)
    -----
    1st place in Humor Category of Psychological Novel Reads Contest 2020 (29 Sep 2020)
    -----
    Started: April 28, 2020
    Completed: July 23, 2021
    Word Count: 160K+
    -----
    The sequel, The Tortoise and His Sunrise, is up on my profile now!

Description:
RATHOD FAMILY : Name is enough to scared all the people of India and mafia of whole Asia. Not royal king but still has higher position then the king of Rajasthan, without their permission even legal work remains illegal, its like no one can take a breathe without their permission in business world, politics as well as in underworld too. 
    
    Even though they are the happy and prosperous family infront of world but behind the doors of their huge mansion; Sons never talks with their fathers , Fathers never ever able to gather enough courage to talk with their sons, grandpa and grandson even though are life of each other but still never able to get glimpse of that life, brothers never ever look at each other thinking that they hate their presence.  This is RATHOD the family of cold hearted devils. 
    
    what If a beautiful angel suddenly comes in their life, when on the first place she never destined to come? 
    
    what If she will try to make them all together and will try to built a beautiful happy living family again? Will she able to be successful or will get fail? 
    
    what If she gets married to the cold hearted alpha man who is a king of devil in skin of human being? what if she started loving this devil even before she knows him or met him? Will he love and cherish that angel or will cut her wings?
    
    
    
    join the journey of this little angel.... how will she bring this broken family together and how much hurt she gets in order to recollect the broken pieces.... her innocent self wants to recollect the broken frame and design it again let's see how she recreate a beautiful frame with or without getting hurt.
    
    join journey of VIDHARTH with his little wife MYTHILI 
    
    
    
    TAKE A LOOK AT PROLOGUE FIRST
    
    
    
    
    
    
    so here i am with my another story of mafia royal romance with lots of family drama.
    how she will break the walls created by her personal devil who has to bear her life long. 
    
    
    do give a chance to this book I'm sure you will not regret. 
    thank you üòä

Description:
She is an ancient profound iron ladle from the cultivation realm. Since she has become a spirit, her only obsession is cultivating a fragrant and soft female body.
    
    A sky thunder smashed her into a wealthy family novel, and she became a true missy who had been wronged in life.
    
    The real missy is the opposite of the fake. She loves vanity and lacks IQ. She is married to the half-paralyzed young uncle of the hero. She focuses on destroying the relationship between the heroine and the hero and ends up miserably.
    
    Faced with the plot of a dog's blood novel, she has only one thought: Great. She can finally be a cute and charming girl.
    
    Later, she shook ten pounds of iron wok in one hand and kicked a big pervert to cry and whimpers.
    
    Everyone: Do you have any misunderstandings about the words "cute and charming"?
    
    Tang Qiaoqiao has good cooking skills. She cooks on one show and also on the next show. While filming, she also works part-time as a chef in the crew. She has become popular.
    
    Her black fans turned to love her and only wished to eat her food. Her co-actor would rather freeload her meal. A director strongly invited her to act because she cured his stomach disease...
    
    A certain president who wants to monopolize her: Enough. She only cooks for me!
    *
    Shen Yue was paralyzed after a car accident. His temperament changed drastically, and his life seemed to fall into the boundless darkness.
    
    At this time, she was the only light in his life. Not only she healed his legs, captured his stomach, but also occupied his heart.
    
    What, if his legs are cured, they will get divorced?
    
    Don't even think about it!
    
    _____________________

Description:
FOR OFF LINE PURPOSES ONLY CREDIT TO THE AUTHOR AND TRANSLATOR(S)!!!
    
    
    
    Ye Zhi not only inherited the shabby house, but also the marriage agreement with a man. The man who met his true love disliked his fiancee in all ways and asked for divorce.
    
    In order to express their guilt, the man's family decided to make up for Ye Zhi. But she didn't want a dime (single cent), so she left.
    
    Next second, Ye Zhi was picked up by Rolls Royce.
    
    Gu Ren, the son of the richest man, had a tough life and couldn't live past 30 years. Only Ye Zhi, born on the cloudy day of the lunar year, could make him survive.
    
    Ye Zhi and Gu Ren got married. Gu Ren gave her a bank card. All she has to do is--
    
    Spend money for him! Squander his fortune!
    
    Ye Zhi bought a Lamborghini for Gu Ren, but he had an accident as soon as he drove the car.
    
    As soon as she bought some Hermes platinum bags for herself, Gu Ren signed a more than one billion worth of deal.
    
    It turned out that the money could only be spent on herself. More she loses, the more prosperous Gu Ren became.
    
    Since then, her life had changed completely. Her villa grandest in the Forbidden City .
    
    The man thought that Ye Zhi, who had been divorced, must have suffered a lot. Until one day, he saw his former fiancee walking in the street, followed by a Rolls Royce.
    
    Wait! Who is the man next to her?
    
    This man is a super rich man hundreds of times richer than his family!

Description:
Btw it's on of my favorite so it's not my own n u can find it on Google but English version is not complete n I copy paste it from original Chinese version...
    I just hope you will like n enjoy it just as much I doüôÇ
    Description
    
    Other titles: "I Can See When You Get Married", "I Know Who Your Future Husband Is"
    
    After waking up from a car accident, not only was I alive, I had also gained a new ability. If I stare at someone or a photo for three seconds, I'm able to see whom and when they shall marry...
    
    The 18th tier small-time actor Shen Chuchu knew that with this skill, her mother would never have to worry that she will starve to death again.
    
    She would put down her roots on Weibo first, then open a matchmaking store on Taobao.*
    
    "Your husband is a close friend and you will be married in March next year. You will have a happy marriage."
    
    "Your husband will appear at your company's dessert store soon, so remember to keep a close watch every day."
    
    ......
    
    *TL-note: Weibo is a popular social media app in China with functions similar to Twitter. Taobao is basically the Chinese eBay/Amazon.
    
    A certain amateur celebrity is already married?
    
    A certain director's wife is going to have an accident soon?
    
    One day, someone came to her for matchmaking.
    
    "Sorry, lady. Fortune-telling requires fate, and it seems like we don't have that between us."
    
    "Isn't this just about money? As long as you can figure out my son's marriage, I can pay you tenfold. No matter how much!"
    
    F***ing hell, it wasn't that she wouldn't predict the match. The arrogant CEO's future spouse was actually her.

Description:
Little cannon fodder Lin Nuan finally came to her senses after experiencing: liking the male protagonist and being used, confronting the female protagonist and being slapped in the face, and being killed instead of cooperating with the villain--
    
        I have money and good looks, why do I have to hang myself from a tree and make trouble with myself?
    
        So..Lin Nuan seeing the male lead again "Go away, go away."
    
        Lin Nuan who saw the heroine again: "Get out of the way."
    
        Lin Nuan who saw the villain again: "Wow, big Dude, I can't be offended."
    
        But by accident, she saved the villain and his family who were still young.
    
        From then on, Lin Nuan found that the villain looked at her more and more strangely, and always came looking for her.
    
        Lin Nuan: Panicked.jpg
    
        Villain: "My grandma likes you."
    
        Lin Nuan: "???"
    
        Villain: "My sister likes you."
    
        Lin Nuan: "???"
    
        Villain: "I like you too."
    
        Lin Nuan: "You're insane!"
    
        As a villain, before he understood the law of true fragrance, Pei Xu's opinion of the eldest lady of the Lin family was: love brain, empty skin.
    
        He felt that even if he starved to death and jumped off the stairs, he would not fall in love with such a woman.
    
        But later, when he looked at Lin Nuan who had saved himself and his family in his arms, he suddenly realized that his face hurt.
    
        He hated her to the end in the previous life, but now he embraces her in this life and wants to protect her well. Pei Xu said: It smells so good.
    
        Reading guide:
    
        1. The heroine was not killed by the villain in her previous life, but someone else.
    
        2. I haven't thought of anything else, I will add it when I think of it.:

    A car accident brought Ruan Qing into the apocalypse, and she was reborn in a delicate and frail daughter of a great family.
    As a young man who was born in New China and grew up under the red flag, the matter of rebirth can be calm, but rebirth in the last days cannot be calm. What kind of world is this? This is the real cannibalism. In desperation, relying on reading a few end-time novels, I desperately opened up the space and searched for a lot of supplies. Now I feel at ease, at least I don't have to worry about eating and drinking. In addition, he was a martial arts coach in his previous life, and he could still fight zombies, so he should be able to survive, right?
    
    What? That cousin who had no good intentions for her brought a bunch of top relatives to trouble her? ha! Don't be afraid! I have a team of foodie teammates with explosive force value.
    What? That fake Bailian wants to take over her identity, and even grab her cold, arrogant and domineering boyfriend? This is not acceptable. Whether it is tolerable or unbearable, court death. Fortunately, my sister is also a god-level mutant, so how could she be afraid of you?
    
    Teammates must bring supplies, and Bailian Green Tea must be grasped with both hands, and both hands must be firm.

Song Weiwei had no choice but to carry the LV on her back, and rode a small broken three-wheeled shuttle through the streets. **Miss, do you want stockings, black silk ones~ Little brother, look at this pantyhose, there are small sides~ Kid, do you want a disc? Have you seen it~ I heard that there is a street stall in S City, who often shuttles through the streets and alleys to do justice? Song Weiwei: That's right, it's next. What is it like to see your wife setting up a street stall downstairs in your company? Gu Shi: Thank you for the invitation, blood pressure is soaring, don't cue. title: (MTL) The daily life of a rich and noble lady

Description:
The apocalypse is coming, and Ruan Ruan, who has no power to restrain a chicken, is terrified and hides in the apocalypse. After struggling for a year, she rescued someone. Later she found out that what she saved was a man from ancient times. The brave general who came through time From now on, the general is responsible for fighting zombies in the front, and she is responsible for cheering and cheering at the back. He was so breathless that no woman dared to marry him. Later, Jinzhao picked up a little lady for himself. The little lady is as timid as a mouse, but she dares to die for him. Thinking now, in the next life, he must protect the little lady Dire wolves are betting that if he is so fierce, he will definitely not be able to talk to someone. However, one day, they saw with their own eyes that Jin Chao, who had just come back from the outside and was covered in blood, suddenly hugged a cute girl who ran in front of him, and the fierceness overflowed from his body immediately. Restrained, only endless tenderness left Teammates who are still single: Shit, we agreed to hold hands together, but you got out of the single and became a dog! It's the same fight against zombies, other people keep each other warm after fighting, but now there are girlfriends who are busy, and the girlfriends are cute and will cheer for the kind of teammates: Jealousy separates the hostage wall, soft supportive heroine VS fierce Single-handed combat strength of the male lead 
    
    * The general and the little lady
    * In the past and present life, there is only each other, both clean and double virgins

title: The Eldest Sister has Space

Description:
Xu Nianyun woke up, feeling disoriented. Her last memory was of her mother urging her to become an academician in the future. Seeking solace, she had snuck out to meet her best friend, but an accident changed everything.
    
    Did she survive the accident? It seemed so, but she found herself transformed into a code data system that transported her back to the 1960s and 1970s. It was bewildering, to say the least. Xu Nianyun had only intended to stir up some chaos, but now something even more incredible occurred-she became bound to her own mother, specifically to her mother's childhood self.
    
    OMG! Could such an amazing thing really happen? Xu Nianyun suddenly felt a strange calmness wash over her, and her trembling hands steadied. She realized that this was an opportunity to cherish her mother and embark on an extraordinary journey together.
    
    Meanwhile, Xiaolu experienced a terrifying incident when she fell from a mountain and encountered an entity known as the "System." From that moment, her life became subject to the system's control, earning her the nickname "chicken baby."
    
    At the age of seven, Xiaolu longed to play with her friends.
    
    System: Have you mastered the algorithm of the chicken and rabbit in the same cage? Learn it, and you'll be rewarded with a piece of chicken cake.
    
    She envied her sisters, who could go to Linzhen to watch movies.
    
    System: After studying all primary school subjects, you will be rewarded with 30 minutes of daily cartoon-watching time.
    
    Xiaolu contemplated attending a technical secondary school.
    
    System: Diligently prepare for the college entrance examination, and not only will you secure your placement, but will also receive 2,000 yuan.
    
    After successfully graduating from college, Xiaolu aspired to pursue postgraduate studies.
    
    System: Congratulations on your self-motivation! As a reward, you will be provided with a blueprint to become a scientific research leader.
    
    Since then, Xiaolu's life has never paused for a moment.

    In
    June 2040, a heavy rain quietly fell on the earth .
    Cities were submerged overnight and people lost their precious places to live.
    Song Yue took her parents and was forced to embark on the road of self-help...
    
    However, due to natural disasters and man-made disasters, unarmed Song's father and mother were beaten to death at home because they refused to hand over Song Yue's supplies.

    Afterwards, Song Yue also died at the hands of a scumbag.
    With endless hatred and determination, she unexpectedly "returned" to her home before the natural disaster.

    After the sun disappeared, the world relied on the artificial suns in the sky. The temperature is getting lower and lower, and human beings are in a desperate situation.
    
    Qin Nuan had a dream that her family wanted to sell her in order to live in the dungeon. She kicked off these so-called family members and ran away decisively.
    
    Unexpectedly, she became a sunflower baby breeder. She had to fed a lot of dishes for sunflowers. Fortunately, the sunflower baby could produce a lot of sunshine stones, which could make vegetables grow super fast, and were also full of vitality.
    
    Qin Nuan went to the countryside to grow vegetables quietly.
    
    Later, a pile of small sunflowers appeared in her vegetable garden and cried to her, "Hungry!Eat!"
    
    Qin Nuan:......
    
    Therefore, there were a lot of small sunflowers in Qin Nuan's vegetable garden, which plunged them into the soil every day to produce sunstones for her with enough horsepower.
    
    Later, the first sunflower became a human baby, and the second sunflower became a human baby...
    
    Qin Nuan: Oh, this crying, the magic voice can't stand it!
    
    One day, a beautiful and gentle young man came to her doorstep: "Hello, I'm sorry that my babies have caused you trouble. Can I stay with you to take care of them?"
    
    The young man raised his hand and gave her a huge sunstone.

Description:
Hu Yaoyao was originally a little fox who had practiced for thousands of years in the Great Smoky Mountains. A cannon fodder female supporting role full of entertainment circle articles, she is obviously beautiful and rich, but she chooses to provide money and resources for the male lead, in exchange for that person saying "You are not good enough for me"?
    
        Hu Yaoyao, who learned the full story, immediately had her pupils upside down and was so angry that she exploded.
    
        Isn't it acting?
    
        Instead of taking advantage of him, why not let this fox fairy come, and really treat her thousand years of time as wasted?
    
        --The green tea essence in urban dramas, the beautiful and miserable female devil in costume dramas, the glamorous female ghost in movies...
    
        Hu Yaoyao can completely control every character.
    
        Relying on her own charm, the heroine of the original text became Hu Yaoyao's best friend, and the scumbag male protagonist of the original text also regretted it and pursued hard.
    
        Hu Yaoyao, on the other hand, fell in love with Xie Zheng, the abstinence actor who was cooperating for the first time. During filming, she tried her best to seduce her, and secretly turned into a prototype to eat and drink at Xie Zheng's place, admiring the beauty by the way.
    
        But that person is Liu Xiahui reincarnated, no matter how much he can't be teased.
    
        Hu Yaoyao: "..."
    
        Withdraw, why give up the entire forest for a single tree.
    
        -
    
        Hu Yaoyao turned and left without looking back.
    
        Xie Zheng, who had always regarded Hu Yaoyao as his food reserve, was impatient, grabbed the furry fox tail, and said in a hoarse and dangerous voice, "Who allowed you to leave without my consent, huh?".

title: Heat Wave Sweeps [Natural Disaster]

Description:
Much to her daughter's dismay, Alexa's mother has fallen in love with the idea of moving into a new house. To make matters worse, this particular building belonged to none other than her very own eccentric uncle that had recently passed away. The property was left in a state of chaos after he'd left, meaning the task of sorting through his possessions and cleaning the place up was left to them.
      
      Follow Alexa  on a journey of discovery, learning about both herself and the black sheep of the family who used to own the house. It's one thing uncovering the disgusting hobbies her late uncle kept (a mixture of taxidermy, dissection, and ancient methods of torture), but when a series of mishaps leads to her inheriting something from the man she never could have dreamed up, it's up to her to make sense of the crazy situation.
